name: Funny Kids Fishing Games
description:
Fishing is such an interesting and exciting task, that there are a lot of simulators dedicated to this topic. But an ordinary simulator can't have such an excitement, which you get while fishing in real life. But a real fishing is not available for everybody. And what should we do, when a kid want to go fishing, or the nearest pond is too far away? And we have a solution! Exciting Hippo games for kids are renewed with an astonishing novelty! Today Hippo goes fishing with a boat in the huge storming ocean! You could never forget this fishing.

Today is a moment, when simulator is as good as a real fishing. Our beloved Hippo prepared for boys and girls a real surprise. Before catching fish with a help of rod, we will use an echo sounder and find the most exotic creatures in the ocean. A huge ocean is full of unbelievable creatures and we will find all of them to set to our oceanarium! Hammerhead, sawfish, narwhal, blue whale and even a powerful Kraken couldn't run away from us and will make Hippo collection bigger. Our games are first of all educational games, you will not only catch fish, but also get a lot of new and interesting information. This is the real kids fishing!

This novelty as well as all our educational games for boys and girls, is absolutely for free. Do you like fishing? Then you have a sit in the Hippo boat. Stay tuned, stay with us and have fun, playing our games with your kids.
developers: Hippo Baby Games for Girls and for Boys
